body.p: HPE Helion OpenStack is provided with two baremetal installation options depending on your system configuration. It allows you to manage the KVM and ESX hypervisors and provision virtual ymachines.

section.title: KVM Hypervisor
section.p: You can use your KVM cloud with either HPE Storevirtual or HPE StoreServ (3PAR) storage:

section.title: HPE StoreVirtual VSA storage
section.p: Cinder Block Storage Using HPE StoreVirtual VSA HPE StoreVirtual VSA Software is a Virtual Storage Appliance for the Linux KVM environment.

section.title: HPE StoreServ (3PAR) storage
section.p: HPE StoreServ (3PAR) Support HPE 3PAR StoreServ is a storage array that supports Fibre Channel (FC) as well as iSCSI protocol.

section.title: Swift Scale-Out cluster
section.p: Scale-out Swift An optional Swift Scale-Out cluster instance of between two and twelve servers that is used for production cloud Object storage use.

section.title: ESX Hypervisor
section.p: Deploy vCenter ESX compute proxy HPE Helion OpenStack supports VMWare ESX hypervisor to provision and manage an overcloud ESX cluster.
